title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 370 - Safety Net Assistance

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 17, 20, 34, 74-h, 104-a, 106-b, 111-a, 131, 131-a, 134-a, 139-a[3], 153, 157, 158, 158-a, 159, 211, 350[2], 355[3], 358, 364; art. 5, titles 9-B, 10; L. 1953, ch. 562; L. 1992, ch. 41; L. 1993, ch. 59; L. 1995, ch. 81; L. 1996, ch. 474;L. 2001, ch. 53; L. 2002, ch. 53; L. 2005, ch. 57, part
C
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
